channel.title: Articles by Juan Almanza
channel.description: Cool things I've learned about programming

item.title: Your site is probably illegal.
item.description: Many people think of website analytics as just another add-on. But it's much more complex than that. Learn how to make analytics protect the privacy of your users and learn how to do it easily.
item.author: scidroid@scidroid.me (Juan Almanza)

item.title: An introduction to Git: My first commit
item.description: Git allows us to manage, distribute and collaborate on our code so that it is organized and there is an efficient workflow when programming with several people, it will also help us to do things like going back to previous versions of our project.
item.author: scidroid@scidroid.me (Juan Almanza)

item.title: Learning to code in Python: The Basics
item.description: Learn to program in Python, a high-level, interpreted, multi-paradigm language used for Web with Flask and Django, Artificial Intelligence and Data Science.
item.author: scidroid@scidroid.me (Juan Almanza)

item.title: Our computers run on sand, a post about silicon.
item.description: Yes, although it seems incredible what I am saying our economy works with sand. well, not exactly, it is a component of sand called silicon.
item.author: scidroid@scidroid.me (Juan Almanza)
